radirius.merc.graphics

Class FrameBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • radirius.merc.graphics.FrameBuffer

  • public class FrameBuffer
extends Object
    An object that allows you to 'draw to a texture.' Good for post-processing effects.
    Author:
    wessles

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FrameBuffer getFrameBuffer()
      Creates a new frame buffer object.
      Texture getTextureObject() 
      static boolean isSupported() 
      void release()
      Finalizes the recording of the FBO, and releases it.
      static void releaseFrameBuffers()
      Returns to original frame buffer (window).
      void use()
      Begins recording of the FBO to the texture object.
      static void useFrameBuffer(FrameBuffer fbo)
      Staticly 'use().'
